title: Earning chests?
body: So after you earn a chest with a champion, does it reset after the month is out like the chest resets, or can you only earn one chest per champion.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EFf46HP2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-22T12:22:10.802+0000)
>
> 1 chest per champ per year

*season xD

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EFf46HP2,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-07-22T20:25:20.695+0000)
>
> *season xD

a season is a year
Thats shitty, Especially if you are consistently doing well enough to be in the top 2% of players on the champ in that elo. diminishing returns.
